data.title: LOVE!
data.text: I love Pollo Loco. This location fort some reason is not crazy busy, which is good for me. It's always really clean and service is great. Way better than the one off Riverside Drive. They always have awesome coupons, so why wouldn't you go?!

data.title: Drive-thru adventures
data.text:
Great solution for no-one-wants-to-cook-tonight situations. We love the family meal special.  Includes salad, chicken, two or three sides, tortillas, churros, and a promotional side dish or entree.  The salad is always flavorful. We always have left-overs for lunch the next day.   

Make it better by using one of the coupons to add four more pieces of chicken or a promotional dish.  The family meal is always changing which keeps this choice from getting boring.

data.title: Great Chicken
data.text: I love the chicken.  I like to get the 4 piece meal, beans, and use some salsa and roll it in the tortillas.  They are quick with your order.  The price is a little expensive for fast food.  It helps if you bring a coupon and you can save a little money.
